Forever passionate about
great service and fair prices

Forever passionate about great service and fair prices

Ms Gas Engineering Services is a team of plumbers and gas engineers operating across Yorkshire
and the Northwest. We are Gas Safe Registered, which means we are fully
compliant with safety regulations and complete our work to an excellent standard.

Contact Us
Call Now

Why we set up MS Gas Services

We set up MS Gas Engineering Services  because we knew that there was a better way of supporting customers by delivering high quality home and boiler service plans.

Our background as an experienced plumbing and gas engineering company means we’re better placed than our competitors (including most boiler insurance providers) to deliver a premium home and boiler care service. Our technical knowledge and first hand front line experience are what sets us apart.

It’s not just about boilers – we also provide flexible care plans for central heating, plumbing and more for both homeowners and landlords.

Why we set up Mr Reactive

We set up Mr Reactive because we knew that there was a better way of supporting customers by delivering high quality home and boiler service plans.

Our background as an experienced plumbing and gas engineering company means we’re better placed than our competitors (including most boiler insurance providers) to deliver a premium home and boiler care service. Our technical knowledge and first hand front line experience are what sets us apart.

It’s not just about boilers – we also provide flexible care plans for central heating, plumbing and more for both homeowners and landlords.

Taking Care of You and Your Home

We understand how important it is for your boiler, central heating, plumbing to
remain in top working order all year round.

Reliable

We’ll ensure an engineer visits your property within 24-48hrs of reporting a breakdown

Trustworthy

We’re always looking at ways to improve our service and have continued transparency between us and the customer.

Convenient

You can easily report breakdowns on the phone or online 24/7.

Supportive

We acknowledge that not all repairs are straightforward, so we ensure that customers are fully supported

Responsive

We are always available within seconds during core hours for general queries and 24hrs for emergencies

DISCOVER OUR PLANS

What Matters to us

Our Customers

Our customers are at the heart of everything we do, so we strive to provide an exceptional service combined with competitive prices.

Our People

Taking the very best care of our employees is a priority for us, so they can take the very best care of you.

The Environment

The environment is very important to us, so we ensure everything we do complies with the strictest of environmental and ethical guidelines.

DISCOVER OUR PLANS

Our Future

Our aim for the future is for millions of homeowners, landlords and estate agents across the UK to choose our cover for their properties. With thousands already taking out our home emergency plans and protecting their homes with boiler service plans, we are already on the way to becoming one of the fastest growing providers of home maintenance cover.

Even so, we are always looking for new ways to grow and expand. To help us, perhaps you could leave us a review of your experience with Ms Gas Engineering Services?

What our customers are saying...

“I can’t thank Ms Gas Engineering Services! Our boiler broke down during a cold snap, and they sent an engineer the same day. He was friendly, efficient, and got it working in no time. The fixed monthly price makes budgeting easy. Highly recommended!”

Jack D., CEO

Incredibly fast and reliable service—arrived the same day I reported the leak. Provided a brand new tap included in the price and even gave a discount. Excellent workmanship, very polite and professional. I’m extremely happy and would highly recommend them!

Nina A., Huddersfield

“The team at Ms Gas Engineering Services! is brilliant. I’ve used them for emergency plumbing and regular boiler servicing, and they never disappoint. Fast response, great communication, and no hidden fees. I feel secure knowing help is just a call away 24/7.”

Liam W., Bradford

“From the first call, Ms Gas Engineering Services impressed me. Friendly customer service, fast same-day callout, and a boiler repair done right the first time. I love that they don’t use subcontractors—it really shows in the quality of their work and best services.”

Emma T., Leeds

Emergencies

Fast, reliable, and professional emergency plumbing service available 24/7 to fix any plumbing problems quickly within Bradford, Leeds and West Yorkshire…

7+ best awards wining

Award-winning service with 7+ top industry honors for excellence.

About us Ms Gas Servises

MS Gas Engineering Services is a trusted team of in-house, Gas Safe registered engineers providing expert plumbing, heating, and boiler solutions across West Yorkshire. We offer 24/7 emergency response, same-day callouts, and transparent pricing. Our goal is to deliver reliable, high-quality service with a focus on customer care and safety.

Our Vision

Our vision is to become the UK’s most trusted provider of reliable, affordable home and boiler cover services.

Our Mission

Our mission is to deliver fast, reliable, and affordable heating and plumbing services with exceptional customer care across the UK.
